text: Urgent: Your account will be locked in 1 hour if you don't verify.
Dear Employee, This is the CEO. Please wire $5000 to this account for a secret project.
Hi mom, I lost my phone. Can you send me some money for a new one?
Your IRS tax return is overdue. Legal action will be taken.
Hello, would you like to grab coffee next Tuesday?
Final warning: Security breach detected. Reset your password now.
This is IT support. We need your password to fix your mailbox.
Congratulations! You won a $1000 gift card. Click here to claim.
Hi, I'm from the HR department. Please fill out this form for your payroll.
You have a new voicemail. Listen here.
Emergency: Your child was in an accident. Send insurance details.
